title: BIS introduced new safety standards for EVs in India
description: Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) introduces safety guidelines for electric vehicles in India, focusing on powertrain components. New rules, IS 18590: 2024 and IS 18606: 2024, aim to enhance safety in L, M, and N vehicle categories.
